purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say

heisig_chinese_memo: Having a word with the next mouth over, like a neighbor, is usually a good way to consult with somebody for cheap. Because, you know, actual consultants charge huge sums.
heisig_constituent: consult with, say, words, keitai, mouth, next, ice, lack, yawn, mouth, mouth2
heisig_story: To seek the words of a second mouth is to consult with someone about something.
myStory: the next (次) mouth (口) will have the words (言) to consult with people
koohiiStory1: Having a word with the next mouth over, like a neighbor, is usually a good way to consult with somebody for cheap. Because, you know, actual consultants charge huge sums.
koohiiStory2: Consulting with is having words with the next mouth.
jp_example_words: 諮る(はかる): to consult with, to confer
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Watch what you say to the next mouth over, because they hired you to consult them.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The person with the next mouth in the room is waiting for you to open yours to consult them. He'll do whatever you say.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You panic, and consult the man into buying a sheep (し).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: He was asking for love advice, so I guess you consulted that he give a sheep to the person he likes? Uh oh. Remind me never to consult with you when I'm feeling unsure about things.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 託 (かこつける、タク доверять, поручать), 話 (はなす、ワ разговор, речь), 詰 (つめる、なじる、キツ、キチ набивать, упаковывать), 詫 (わびる、タ просить прощения)

諮る(はかる): to consult with, to confer

從「 言 」，「 咨 」聲。「 諮 」同「 咨 」，表示咨詢、商議。如《國語．晉語》：「吾聞國家有大事，必順於典刑，而訪諮於耇老，而後行之。」《孔子家語．弟子解》：「於是衛以子夏為聖。孔子卒後，教於西河之上。魏文侯師事之，而諮國政焉。」《後漢書．黨錮列傳》：「每有疑事，常密諮問之。」
От «говорящего» до «консультационного» звука. «Консультация» - это то же самое, что «консультация», что означает консультации и переговоры. Такие как «Мандарин. «Джин Ю»: «Я слышал, что в стране происходят крупные события, поэтому я должен следовать предложению, посетить и посоветоваться с пожилыми людьми, а затем сделать это». «Домашний разговор Конфуция». «Объяснение ученика»: «Итак, Вэй считает Цзыся святым. После смерти Конфуция он учил на Сихэ. Вэй Вэньхоу учил его и консультировал по стране и политике». «Хоу Хань Шу. «Биография партии»: «Если есть сомнения, часто консультируйтесь с ними».

諮字的基本解释

諮
zī
见“谘”。

諮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zī］
［《廣韻》即夷切，平脂，精。］
同“咨1”。“谘1”的繁体字。
(1)商议；征询。
(2)唐宋学士院向三省申报文书。
(3)通“資”。蓄。
(4)通“資”。给。参见“諮酒”。

諮字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　諮； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1171第04
【廣韻】卽夷切【集韻】津私切，?音資。與咨同。謀也，問也。【詩·小雅】周爰咨諏。【釋文】咨本亦作諮。【左傳·桓六年】夏會於成紀，來諮謀齊難也。【後漢·趙典傳】朝廷每有災異疑議，輒諮問之。

考證：〔【後漢·趙典傳】朝廷每有災異疑議，輒諮門之。〕　謹照原文諮門改諮問。

Consult
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zī］
["Guangyun" is cut, flat fat, refined. ]
Same as "Consultation 1". Traditional Chinese characters for "咨询1".
(1) Negotiation; consultation.
(2) The Tang and Song Academy of Scholars declares documents to the three provinces.
(3) Through "capital". Accumulate.
(4) Through "capital". give. See "Consultation Wine".
Consult
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【You Ji 1】【Words Department】　Zhi; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1171 04
[Guang Yun] 卽 Yi cut [Ji Yun] Jin private cut,? Yin Zi. With consultation. Ask too, ask too. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Zhou Yan Zixu. [Explanation] The reference book is also used as a reference. [Zuo Zhuan·Huan Sixth Year] Xia Huiyu Chengji, it is difficult to come to consult and plan together. [Later Han·Zhao Dian Chuan] Whenever the court had any doubts about disasters, they would be consulted. Textual research: [[Later Han·Zhao Dian Biography] Every time the court has any doubts about disasters, it will be consulted. 〕 　 I would like to change the inquiry according to the original.

Reading Mnemonic
You panic, and consult the man into buying a sheep (し).
He was asking for love advice, so I guess you consulted that he give a sheep to the person he likes? Uh oh. Remind me never to consult with you when I'm feeling unsure about things.
